General.Name: PT Jaya Bersama Indo Tbk
General.Description: PT Jaya Bersama Indo Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of Chinese restaurants in Indonesia. It operates 32 restaurant outlets primarily under the brand names of The Duck King Group, Fook Yew, and Panda Bowl. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Business Park Kebon Jeruk Blok C.2, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia

AddressData.Street: Business Park Kebon Jeruk Blok C.2
